Key Match Events: Rhett Lowder gave up three earned runs and six hits over 5 1/3 innings with one walk and five strikeouts
Carlos Santana hit a double to the gap in right-center field
Ryan Jeffers hit the game-tying RBI double to left field
Brooks Lee added a two-run single to right-center field
Pre-Game Insights: Rhett Lowder is making a case for a rotation spot in the 2025 season
Lowder has made four starts for Cincinnati and is 1-2 with a 1.74 ERA
Post-Match Reflections: Twins manager Rocco Baldelli was impressed with Lowder's performance
Reds manager David Bell said Lowder is doing well and will continue to learn and find ways to get better
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lowder has faced good teams in his four starts, including the Brewers, Astros, and Cardinals
Lowder is ranked by MLB Pipeline as Cincinnati's No. 2 prospect and No. 32 overall
Others: Lowder was the seventh overall pick in the 2023 Draft
Lowder has 22 Minor League starts during his first pro season in 2024
